name: Evolution Bridge
description: TRIZ Evolution Bridge - Analyze system evolution patterns and predict future development directions

evolution_laws.description: Every technical system must have four parts: engine, transmission, working unit, and control unit
Energy must flow through all parts of the system for it to function properly
All parts of the system must be coordinated in terms of rhythm, frequency, and timing
Systems evolve toward increased ideality (benefits/costs + harms)
Different parts of a system develop at different rates, creating contradictions
Systems evolve from macro to micro level, using smaller elements
Systems evolve by integrating into larger super-systems
Systems become more flexible, adaptable, and controllable over time

analysis_framework.current_stage_assessment: Evaluate current system stage based on characteristics
analysis_framework.contradiction_identification: Identify contradictions preventing evolution to next stage
analysis_framework.future_direction_prediction: Predict likely evolution path based on TRIZ laws
analysis_framework.innovation_recommendations: Generate specific recommendations for accelerating evolution
